segments.text: Can you take he away from me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m just coming for that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She ’ s your sister.What she asked was only duck soup for you.Why can ’ t you be good to her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I am her brother , not her servant .
segments.speaker: S2
